title: Mail account password change tbird mobile how?
creator: gadget2
content: Need to change mail account password in mobile app. How do I do that?

title: Android certificate errors
creator: martin27
content:
Haven't changed any settings. On two accounts, both hosted at heart internet, today I've started getting Certificate errors - check your settings in android notifications. Mails appear in sent but are not going out, no incoming mail.

Another account with the same settings and host is still working fine on bluemail.

I can't find any useful settings or diagnostics to check.

Other accounts using Hotmail are still fine.

Ideas?

Martin/

title: Thunderbird for Windows has far more items in Inbox than TB for Android
creator: Tombarkas
content: OK, I give up. As far as I know, my settings for TB for Android are the same as TB for Windows. However, I have 1300 emails in the Inbox in TB for Windows (and can search them), but only about 20-30 in TB for android (hopeless for a search). What am i doing wrong?

title: Sign-in issues after changing Google password
creator: jderbyshire67
content:
Hi,

Get an error message with... Error 403: disallowed_useragent ...when trying to sign in.

Message includes: "If you're seeing this error message in Thunderbird for Android's app, you can contact the developer to let them know that their app must comply with Google's 'Use secure browsers' policy." Learn more about this error: https://support.google.com/accounts/answer/7675428
